abstract: The emotions that bubbled up between St. Louis and Milwaukee,  National League Central Division rivals,  in the regular season resurfaced again Saturday, the day before the teams open the N.L. Championship Series.
snippet: The emotions that bubbled up between St. Louis and Milwaukee,  National League Central Division rivals,  in the regular season resurfaced again Saturday, the day before the teams open the N.L. Championship Series.

headline.main: Between Brewers and Cardinals, Sparks Fly, Along With Chaw
headline.print_headline: Sparks Fly For Rivals, As Do Bits Of Chaw
